com.automation.seletest.core.services.actions

Interface WaitFor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBase.WaitBase, ExpectedWaitStrategy, SeleniumWaitStrategy

    public interface WaitFor
    Interface for waiting methods
    Author:
    Giannis Papadakis(mailTo:gpapadakis84@gmail.com) *
